products.name: Smartphone A
products.desc: Latest 5G smartphone with AMOLED display and fast charging.
products.detail: This smartphone features a 6.5-inch AMOLED display, a 5000mAh battery, and supports 5G connectivity for super-fast internet speeds. Perfect for gaming, streaming, and productivity.

products.name: Smartphone B
products.desc: Premium smartphone with a stunning camera and sleek design.
products.detail: The Smartphone B is equipped with a 48MP camera and a sleek design that fits comfortably in your hand. It also boasts a long-lasting battery and fast charging capabilities.

products.name: Smartphone D
products.desc: Affordable smartphone with excellent performance.
products.detail: Smartphone D offers great performance with a smooth user experience, featuring a 6.4-inch screen and a reliable camera. It's a budget-friendly option without compromising quality.

products.name: Smartphone D
products.desc: Compact smartphone with advanced features.
products.detail: This compact smartphone packs advanced features like facial recognition, a 12MP camera, and a 6.2-inch display, making it a perfect choice for those seeking portability.

products.name: Smartphone E
products.desc: Flagship smartphone with high-end specs and a powerful battery.
products.detail: Smartphone E comes with top-of-the-line specs, including a Snapdragon 888 processor, 12GB of RAM, and a 6000mAh battery, ensuring performance and endurance.

products.name: Laptop A
products.desc: Lightweight laptop with high performance and long battery life.
products.detail: Laptop A offers a sleek design and is equipped with an Intel i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and a 512GB SSD, making it ideal for professionals and students.

products.name: Laptop B
products.desc: Powerful gaming laptop with a sleek design.
products.detail: Laptop B is powered by an RTX 3060 graphics card and a 15.6-inch 144Hz display, providing an immersive gaming experience with high frame rates and vivid graphics.

products.name: Laptop C
products.desc: Budget-friendly laptop with essential features for daily use.
products.detail: Laptop C provides all the essential features you need for everyday tasks, such as browsing, word processing, and video conferencing, all at an affordable price.

products.name: Laptop D
products.desc: Professional laptop with a vibrant display and fast processor.
products.detail: Laptop D boasts a 4K display, an Intel i9 processor, and 32GB of RAM, offering an exceptional experience for content creators, designers, and professionals.

products.name: Laptop E
products.desc: Creative laptop optimized for designers and content creators.
products.detail: Laptop E features a color-accurate display, a powerful processor, and ample storage, making it perfect for creative professionals in graphic design, video editing, and 3D modeling.

products.name: Speaker A
products.desc: Portable speaker with powerful bass and water resistance.
products.detail: Speaker A offers rich bass and loud volume in a portable form factor, making it perfect for outdoor activities. It's also waterproof, so you can take it to the beach or pool.

products.name: Speaker B
products.desc: High-quality Bluetooth speaker with immersive sound.
products.detail: Speaker B provides deep bass and crystal-clear highs, ensuring an immersive audio experience for music lovers. It also features Bluetooth connectivity for easy pairing with devices.

products.name: Speaker C
products.desc: Compact speaker with long battery life and durable build.
products.detail: Speaker C offers long-lasting battery life and a rugged build, making it perfect for travel, hiking, or camping. Its compact size doesn't compromise on sound quality.

products.name: Speaker D
products.desc: Multi-room speaker system with excellent connectivity.
products.detail: Speaker D allows you to connect multiple speakers and create a multi-room audio system. Its seamless Bluetooth connectivity makes it easy to play music throughout your home.

products.name: Speaker E
products.desc: Premium wireless speaker with crystal-clear audio.
products.detail: Speaker E delivers premium sound quality with rich tones and deep bass. It offers wireless connectivity and is perfect for both indoor and outdoor listening.

products.name: Smartphone F
products.desc: Affordable phone with great build quality.
products.detail: Smartphone F offers excellent value with its sturdy build, decent camera, and long battery life. It's a great option for anyone on a budget who doesn't want to compromise on quality.

products.name: Smartphone G
products.desc: Ultra-fast phone with a powerful gaming processor.
products.detail: Smartphone G is optimized for gaming, featuring a high-refresh-rate display and a powerful processor that ensures smooth gameplay even with graphically demanding games.

products.name: Laptop F
products.desc: Business laptop with excellent keyboard and high storage.
products.detail: Laptop F is designed for professionals, featuring a responsive keyboard, a high-res display, and large storage capacity to handle business workloads.

products.name: Laptop G
products.desc: Convertible 2-in-1 laptop for work and entertainment.
products.detail: Laptop G offers flexibility with its 2-in-1 design, allowing you to switch between laptop and tablet mode. It's perfect for work, entertainment, and creative projects.

products.name: Speaker F
products.desc: Rugged Bluetooth speaker for outdoor adventures.
products.detail: Speaker F is built to withstand the elements, with a durable design that can handle drops, rain, and dust. It's perfect for outdoor adventures and camping trips.

products.name: Speaker G
products.desc: Premium speaker with smart assistant integration.
products.detail: Speaker G integrates seamlessly with smart assistants like Alexa and Google Assistant, allowing you to control your music and other smart devices with voice commands.
